meanings.definition: A graft of tissue between genetically identical individuals.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed an isografts on the twins to replace damaged tissue.
meanings.sent2: The isografts between the identical twins was successful.
meanings.sent3: The isografts between the clones was like a genetic high-five.
meanings.sent4: The isografts acted like a biological mirror between the siblings.
meanings.sent5: The isografts created a seamless bond between the genetically identical patients.

meanings.definition: To transplant tissue from one individual to another genetically identical individual.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon will isografts skin from the donor to the recipient.
meanings.sent2: They isografts the organ to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: The doctors decided to isografts the tissue as a genetic gift exchange.
meanings.sent4: She isografts the cells with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Isografts the tissue gently to ensure a successful transplant.
